directions: In a slow cooker, place onions, celery, rice mix, water, condensed cream of mushroom soup, butter, American cheese and mushrooms. Cover, and cook on Low 6 to 10 hours or on High 2 to 4 hours.
ingredients: 2 (6 ounce) packages dry instant long grain and wild rice mix
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
title: Wild Rice Casserole I
